name: One Time Use Crazy Pills
description:
One Time Use - Crazy Pills

This is my first ever game jam, developed solo. Worked odd hours spread over 4 days in my spare time.

Simple escape room style game where the core gimmick is changing size. Can you find a way out?

For the Quest 2.

Frankly, finished this in a rush. There are likely a million bugs and ways of breaking this game, did not find the time to play test, haha! Also
 - yes, there's no audio

 - yes the file size is stupidly big

 - yes it's very short!

UPDATE NOTE - Just to clarify things, unfortunately there's no completion state in this prototype other than being outside the cell, (I was at the tail end of an all-nighter on a work day and basically gave up, haha!). Just give yourself a pat on the back when you get out (if you didn't cheat, that is!) 

Also, restart by holding right thumbstick for a short duration (i.e 0.4 seconds))

Would love to expand on this concept, there were better puzzle ideas that didn't make the cut, I swear!

Made using...

Unity

XR Tool kit / Open XR (i.e. the provided example build for this jam was used as a base)

Probuilder
